translations: 异常清晰的；极为逼真的

sentences.sentence: People possessing eidetic imagery will confidently claim to still "see" the picture.
sentences.translation: 拥有“遗觉表象”能力的人将自信满满地声称仍可以“看见”那幅图。

sentences.sentence: Your eidetic memory must be a blessing.
sentences.translation: 你异常清晰的记忆，是一种祝福。

sentences.sentence: When he was twelve he'd learned that he'd been born with an eidetic memory.
sentences.translation: 当他还是十二岁的时候，他知道他天生有幅异常清晰的记忆。
